NOTICE
Under sub-section (1) of Section 15 of the Tamil Nadu Highways Act, 2001 (Tamil Nadu Act 34 of 2002) the Governor of Tamil Nadu hereby acquires the land specified in the Schedule below measuring to an extent of 1848 sq.mts of Wet and Manai lands in Neelakkudi Village, Nannilam Taluk, Thiruvarur District for the purpose of widening of Mayiladuthurai Thiruvarur road (SH-23) from km 34/234 to 34/530 km.
SCHEDULE
The plan of the lands are kept in the Office of the Special District Revenue Officer (Land Acquisition), Kumbakonam and Office of the Special Tashildar (Land Acquisition), Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Thiruvarur, may be inspected at any time during office hours.
